prod.full_name: Nike Air Max BW OG Persian Violet (2021)
prod.path: Home/Sneakers/Nike/Air Max/Nike Air Max BW OG Persian Violet (2021)
prod.desciption:
In celebration of its 30th Anniversary, Nike reissued the original 1991 Air Max BW with the Nike Air Max BW Persian Violet.

One of the lesser-known designs from legendary Nike and Jordan designer Tinker Hatfield, the Nike Air Max BW introduced a larger visible Air Unit to the Air Max line, which led to the name Big Window (BW for short). In addition to enhanced visible Air, the design boasts a layered construction of black and white mesh, leather, and Durabuck with blue Swooshes.

The Nike Air Max BW Persian Violet released in September of 2021 and retailed for $130.
